matching._comment: Available strategies: 'identifier' (match by Linear ID), 'attachment-url' (match by Jira URLs in Linear attachments), 'hybrid' (try identifier first, fallback to attachment-url)
matching._note: When using 'attachment-url' or 'hybrid', the system will use your jira.host for precise URL matching

rateLimiting._comment: Rate limiting and retry configuration - all fields are optional with sensible defaults
rateLimiting._note: The tool automatically detects rate limits AND network errors, retries with exponential backoff, and respects Retry-After headers
rateLimiting._retryBehavior: Retries: rate limits (429), network errors (timeouts, connection failures, DNS issues). Does NOT retry: auth errors (401/403), validation errors (400/422)
rateLimiting._maxRetriesNote: Maximum number of retry attempts for transient errors (default: 5)
rateLimiting._initialDelayNote: Initial delay in milliseconds before first retry (default: 1000ms = 1s)
rateLimiting._delayBetweenNote: Minimum delay between ALL requests to prevent API spam (default: 100ms)
rateLimiting._backoffNote: Exponential backoff multiplier - delay doubles each retry (default: 2)
